basic.description:
An introduction to the language, literature, and culture of medieval Scandinavia in the Viking Age. Fall Term: A rapid survey of Old Icelandic morphology and literary texts in E.V. Gordon's Introduction to Old Norse. Winter Term: A complete saga. 
NOTE    May be offered jointly with ENGL 822/6.0.
basic.subject: ENGL
basic.title: Old Norse

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites    [(ENGL200 and ENGL290) and (a GPA of 2.40 on all ENGL units)] or [(a cumulative GPA of 2.60) and (registration in a MDVL  Plan)].
